title: The land under CDS, irrespective of the tenure of the plots comprised therein, shall be treated as one plot for the purpose of FSI and computation of marginal distances
clause_text: The land under CDS, irrespective of the tenure of the plots comprised therein, shall be treated as one plot for the purpose of FSI and computation of marginal distances.
